text.__SUMMARY__: Conus bruguieri is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae, the cone snails and their allies.Like all species within the genus Conus, these snails are predatory and venomous. They are capable of poisoning humans.
text.Description: The size of the shell varies between 22 mm and 38 mm.
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off Senegal.
